summary: This is Marcos The Kahjiit. This mod is for a friend named Marcos. This Kahjiit can be found standing on a fencing post in Riverood by the inn. I Am going to make him a follower later on, but this is really just for fun.
descriptionHtml: This is Marcos The Kahjiit. This mod is for a friend named Marcos. This Kahjiit can be found standing on a fencing post in Riverood by the inn. I Am going to make him a follower later on, but this is really just for fun. So you guys don\\\'t have to download it. This is also my first mod so don\\\'t complain even if you download it. So Yeah. <3 U MARCOS.
author: Pc4life220
